actions.name: Inherited Resolve
actions.description:
Trigger: The user drops below 50% HP.
Effect: Connection - Secret Sword. The user transforms into its Resolute Forme. When the user gains @Affliction[fainted], it transforms into its Ordinary Forme. The user may also spend 6 PP as part of a Simple Action to chance Forme (otherwise, changed freely outside of combat with time).

actions.name: Inherited Resolve
actions.description: Passive: While in Resolute Forme, the user may use its [Sharp] and [Horn] attacks as Special-Category attacks, the user's Physical Reach increases by +1., and the user takes 15% less damage from all sources.
